name: Shiranui Style Successor (v1)
text:
At the beginning of the Duel, if you have 10 or more Zombie-Type monsters in your Deck, add 4 types of "Shiranui" monsters to your Extra Deck, and send 1 "Shiranui Spectralsword" card to your Graveyard from outside of your Deck. During this Duel, you can only Special Summon monsters with Levels, except for Zombie-Type monsters or FIRE monsters. You can also use any of the effects below only once during this Duel.
● Send 1 Level 4 monster in your hand to the Graveyard, and add 1 "Shiranui" card to your hand from your Deck.
● Return all Synchro and Link Monsters to your Extra Deck that are banished or are in your Graveyard including 2 or more Synchro Monsters. Banish 2 Zombie-Type FIRE monsters with different Levels from your Extra Deck (said monsters can be Special Summoned).
